Try something new!<br><br>Creating a climate for innovation in language learning<br><br>11 March 2015, 18.00 \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd 21.00<br><br>The event will mark the launch of the British Council\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdThink Differently!\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd project which will ultimately lead to it working with schools on innovative micro-projects. [...] Dirscherl Margit 2015-02-05T15:33:17+00:00 2015-02-05T15:33:17+00:00 CFP: Urban Microcosms (1789-1940), University of Bristol https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ALL-FRENCH;2678fcf1.1502 Call for Papers<br>Urban Microcosms (1789-1940)<br>University of Bristol, 14-16 September 2015<br>Deadline: 29 February 2015<br><br>It is a commonplace of scholarship that modernity in literature and culture is bound up with city life. The growth of cities over the course of the nineteenth century, so the argument runs, fostered social and intellectual, literary and artistic diversity; and as a result, new ways of seeing things emerged, which were captured most prominently, but not exclusively, in the works of Charles Baudelaire. Yet public life in cities is not evenly distributed across the various urban spaces. For this year's International Education Week (17 - 21<br>November) the British Council is running a series of webinars aimed at UK<br>teachers on 'Make the most of your partner school'. Our two French-focused<br>webinars are: [...] Wendy Newman 2014-10-28T11:35:44-00:00 2014-10-28T11:35:44-00:00 Language teaching stars needed - your chance to shine! https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ALL-FRENCH;4d06adc7.1410 ***(with apologies for cross posting)***<br><br>Do you know a very special language teacher?<br><br>A teacher who inspires pupils through superb teaching and supports<br>colleagues by sharing their expertise and ideas?<br><br>If you do, then why not nominate them for a<br><https://www.routesintolanguages.ac.uk/> Routes into Languages /<br><http://www.all-languages.org.uk/> Association for Language Learning<br>Language Teacher of the Year Award?<br><br>There are three Awards: [...] Wendy Newman 2014-10-16T15:25:18+01:00 2014-10-16T15:25:18+01:00 French ALLnet query https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ALL-FRENCH;4343340.1410 Good afternoon colleagues,<br><br>Please see message below for information.<br><br>Best wishes,<br><br>Wendy<br><br>ALL<br><br>_____<br><br>From: O'Leary, Christine [mailto:C.T.OLeary@shu.ac.uk]<br>Sent: 16 October 2014 11:20<br>To: 'info@all-languages.org.uk'<br>Cc: 'Steven Fawkes'<br>Subject: Job Opportunity<br><br>Hi Wendy,<br><br>I wonder whether you could circulate this on French ALLnet in case some<br>colleagues are interested.<br><br>SHEFFIELD HALLAM UNIVERSITY<br><br>The University is looking for a 0.5 French Lecturer to cover a maternity<br>leave for a period of six months, preferably from mid-November. [...] Wendy Newman 2014-10-15T16:03:45+01:00 2014-10-15T16:03:45+01:00 Funding to visit your French school partner https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ALL-FRENCH;ed556b42.1410 Good afternoon,<br><br>Please note the information below from the British Council.<br><br>Best wishes,<br><br>Wendy<br><br>ALL<br><br>Funding to visit your French school partner<br><br>Secondary schools, sixth form and further education colleges that already<br>have a partnership with a school in France can apply for funding for<br>reciprocal student visits through the British Council. Both Charles de<br>Gaulle and Lef\ufffd\ufffdvre<br><https://schoolsonline.britishcouncil.org/apply-for-funding/charles-de-gaull<br>e-and-lefevre-trust> offer \ufffd\ufffd5,000 for reciprocal visits and for extended<br>project work. And if you and your partner school apply at the same time you<br>could access \ufffd\ufffd10,000 in total. Find out more and apply by 11 November<br><https://schoolsonline.britishcouncil.org/apply-for-funding/charles-de-gaull<br>e-and-lefevre-trust> . [...] Steven Fawkes 2014-09-27T11:56:59+01:00 2014-09-27T11:56:59+01:00 Fwd: French Literature in KS2 and 3 https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ALL-FRENCH;34a49a0.1409 In case you missed it in ALLnet -<br>http://www.all-languages.org.uk/events-list/details/read/seminar_learning_french_with_literature_in_key_stages_2_and_3<br><br>Free seminar for French teachers on Literature in KS2 and 3 at Institut<br>Francais, S. Kensington, Sat morning 11 October.<br><br>Please advertise to your contacts/trainees if it is relevant / reachable<br>and you can.<br><br>Helen, can you mention at the London Trainee Reception event too please?<br><br>Signing up instructions are on the webpage but also here: [...] Accentlanguages 2014-07-18T08:19:39+01:00 2014-07-18T08:19:39+01:00 Thank you for including me https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ALL-FRENCH;f3143fe1.1407 Nadine Chadier, Accent Tiffany Frost 2014-07-14T12:12:34+01:00 2014-07-14T12:12:34+01:00 Language Teacher of the Year Award https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ALL-FRENCH;67660175.1407 Do you know and amazing language teacher who deserves recognition?<br>Recognising the very best and most inspiring language teachers in two categories:<br><br>*Primary Language Teacher of the Year*<br>*Secondary Language Teacher of the Year*<br><br>Plus a special award for<br>*HE Language Student Ambassador of the Year*<br><br>Nominations will open September 2014 and full details will be available on the website of<br>ALL: www.all-languages.org.uk and Routes into Languages: www.routesintolanguages.ac.uk<br>#LanguageTeachingStars [...] Tiffany Frost 2014-07-14T10:48:57+01:00 2014-07-14T10:48:57+01:00 Win \ufffd\ufffd5000 grant to visit your partner school in France! https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ALL-FRENCH;830619c3.1407 Improve your students\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd confidence and motivation to learn French with a \ufffd\ufffd5000 grant to visit your partner school in France. A trip to France provides a broader, more enriching experience of the French language and culture and can help to boost Ofsted results at your school.<br><br>Secondary schools, including sixth form and further education colleges can apply for the grants. Schools must have an existing partnership with a French institution. If you are interested in this opportunity but do not have a French school partner, schoolsonline.britishcouncil.org/programmes-and-funding/etwinning has everything you need to set one up. [...] Wendy Newman 2014-07-02T11:55:41+01:00 2014-07-02T11:55:41+01:00 FW: British Academy Language Awards https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ALL-FRENCH;79cace9f.1407 For information!<br><br>Best wishes,<br><br>Wendy<br>ALL<br><br>-----Original Message-----<br>From: Louise Lyle [mailto:louise.lyle@ulip.lon.ac.uk]<br>Sent: 19 June 2014 12:57<br>To: wendyn@all-languages.org.uk<br>Subject: British Academy Language Awards<br><br>Dear Wendy,<br><br>I'm writing to you on behalf of ULIP which is a member of the Association<br>for Language Learning. As you're possibly aware, we're a small institution<br>of the University of London based in Paris, offering a three-year BA in<br>French all of which is taught on site here in Paris. [...] Wendy Newman 2014-05-15T15:36:27+01:00 2014-05-15T15:36:27+01:00 FW: FREE Tour de France Resources for all UK primary schools https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ALL-FRENCH;8d2889af.1405 Dear all,<br><br>ALL has a new Corporate Member, Headstart Languages, who has asked us to<br>send out this information to primary specialists across the country.<br><br>Thanks very much for your help!<br><br>Wendy<br><br>ALL<br><br>From: Leanne Jefferson [mailto:enquiries@headstartlanguages.co.uk]<br>Sent: 11 May 2014 18:25<br>To: wendyn@all-languages.org.uk<br>Subject: FREE Tour de France Resources for all UK primary schools<br><br>Dear Wendy<br><br>Lovely to speak with you on Friday and I am delighted that we are now<br>members of your organisation.
